description: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library (GLEW) is a cross-platform open-source C/C++ extension loading library. GLEW provides efficient run-time mechanisms for determining which OpenGL extensions are supported on the target platform. OpenGL core and extension functionality is exposed in a single header file. This is a NuGet package of GLEW built with Visual Studio 2015. Static library only.

title: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library
